name: Wizard Boon
description:
**********************************************************************

Why are those  skeletons so close to the village. Something is not right. 

Find out what exactly and remember, Less is More.

**********************************************************************

A game made in a week for the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3.

Its been a very long time since I made a game and actually completed it, so this was a very nice opportunity to change that.

Twitter: @KnightDevGames

Instagram: @knight_dev_games

Website: KnightDevGames

Devblog coming soon!

  • Art: KnightDevGames (Nabil)  and Adnan
  • Code:  KnightDevGames (Nabil) 
  • Sound effect:  KnightDevGames (Nabil) (made with bfxr and audacity)
  • Background Theme music: https://joshua-mclean.itch.io/music-pack-8

#####################################

Using a card when its enlarged cause a bug where all the cards get positioned at the bottom left corner of the screen.
